connection_id.description: ID of the FQDN connection to which this IP should be attached.

port.description: Port to use when connecting to this FQDN.

dns_record_type.description: The DNS record type for the FQDN. For cases where a port is not set, the DNS record type must be 'srv'. For cases where a port is set, the DNS record type must be 'a'. If the DNS record type is 'a' and a port is not specified, 5060 will be used.
